title: Virgin Pink Scandal
description: One day, hard-working set builder Kazunari Sakamoto gets pulled into a corner by the up-and-coming heartthrob TV star Rei Toyokawa. "Seeing you with your shirt off got me excited." Next thing Kazunari knows, Rei has him pinned against the wall. Kazunari runs from the actor's advances at first, but soon comes to realize Rei's genuinely enamored, despite his obsession with Kazunari's chest... "Getting this much pleasure from another man is embarrassing..." A hot but naughty celebrity gets with a straight-laced studio staff member in this scandalous romance!...
